      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los líquenes como ejemplo de simbiosis</string>
            <string language="en">Lichens as an example of symbiosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flechten als Beispiel der Symbiose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lichens comme exemple de la symbiose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lichens como um exemplo do symbiosis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Licheni come esempio di simbiosi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειχήνες ως παράδειγμα της συμβίωσης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir qué es una simbiosis, qué es un liquen y cómo está formado.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student has to discover what symbiosis is, what a lichen is and how it is formed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">simbiosis</string>
            <string language="en">symbiosis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Líquenes</string>
            <string language="en">Lichens</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, was Symbiose ist, eine welche Flechte ist und wie sie gebildet 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir ce qu'est la symbiose, quel lichen est et comment elle est 
formée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante tem que descobrir o 
que o symbiosis é, que lichen é e como é dada forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che cosa 
la simbiosi è, ché lichene è e come è formato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει
ποια συμβίωση είναι, τι μια λειχήνα είναι και πώς διαμορφώνεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Symbiose</string>
          </keyword>
